00039 int CommandExists::run() {
00040   bool exists = false;
00041 
00042   if (m_args.size() < 1) {
00043     cerr << "Error: no filename supplied" << endl;
00044     return -1;
00045   }
00046 
00047   exists = m_client->exists(m_args[0].first);
00048 
00049   if (exists)
00050     cout << "true" << endl;
00051   else
00052     cout << "false" << endl;
00053 
00054   return Error::OK;
00055 }
